item.title: Naomi Biden推特长文捍卫父亲Hunter Biden >That aged well 🤡
item.description: https://twitter.com/NaomiBiden/status/1308823998415933440 该推文于9月23日发布，以下为节选： “Though the whole world knows his name, no one knows who he is. Here’s a thread on my dad, Hunter Biden - free of charge to the …
